BG3 The Great Old One Tips & Builds

The Great Old One may be the most defensive of the three Warlock Subclasses. The Great Old One's first unique feature Mortal Reminder allows to inflict the Frightened status effect when you land a critical hit. It may even inflict this status effect on several creatures, if they are close by the attacked one. This pairs great with Eldritch Blast, since it may be used to attack more than one objective.
